<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emberheart](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1054)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small, heart-shaped amulet appears to be sculpted from stone with a single streak of dim light running through, like an ember just beneath ashes. When worn, the amulet gives off a gentle warmth, akin to being near a fireplace. You gain [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) resistance 15 when wearing this amulet.

 When you invest the amulet, you either increase your Constitution score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You hold the amulet aloft as a ripple of warm orange light exudes outward. Each ally in a 30-foot emanation regains 30 Hit Points and gains a +3 status bonus to Fortitude saves until the end of their next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
